casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Shelly, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Shelly (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 168.]

(No. 98-598 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 23, 1998.) Mentzer, Vuillemin & Mygrant, Ltd., and Donald J. Malarcik, Jr., for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Coók and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
